faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without restriction. UK and EU citizens have straightforward purchasing processes. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and typically engage a Spanish solicitor and surveyor. The process takes 4-6 weeks from offer to completion, with transparent costs around 8-10% of purchase price including legal fees, taxes, and registration.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, budget approximately 8-10% in additional costs: 3% transfer tax (ITP), legal fees 1-1.5%, notary fees 0.5%, and registration around 0.5%. On this €325,900 property, expect additional costs of roughly €26,000-32,000. Ongoing annual costs include community fees (typically €80-120 monthly for urbanizations), property tax (0.4-1.1% annually), and utilities.
